duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting and assisting season ticket holders, fans, and guests in the Arena, Box Office Lobby, Suites Entrances, Premium Clubs, Guest Experience Office and Podiums throughout the Arena & Theater.
Distributing giveaways and fan recognition gifts.
Ensuring all guest environments are up to standards prior to the start of the event.
Resolving guest issues during the event and coordinating seating relocations as necessary.
Assisting with any new customer-focused event/activity involving guest services representatives.
Partnering with key sales account executives and other internal departments to support their needs and those of season ticket holders and fans.
Greeting and validating guest entry into premium club areas and working closely with VIP Services.
Assisting with suite client needs at concierge locations and aiding guests with disabilities.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2 years of service experience in a customer service environment.
E.A.M alcohol management certification required (Training provided).
